attributes.action: Reduce the pension entitlement of all government employees and public servants, if they have been found to have failed in their duty, to the state pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To set up an independent body that is able to reduce the pension entitlement of government employees and public servants following a failure in office. i.e “baby P”, failing schools, underperforming against targets / promises.
